item.description:
Due to a family emergency, this meeting had to be cancelled by our host.

================================================

Our monthly Concord video screening is on the 3rd Tuesday every month. We'll pick our video for this month from our massive collection.

Just to let everyone know, there is a final revision coming for the Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth video, Explosive Evidence and there will be showings all over the state. We should spend some time at the meeting planning for how we'd publicize a showing in the Concord area and where the screening would take place.

See you all at the meeting at Liberty Books and be sure to bring a snack or a box of tea to help our host keep an inventory for our meetings.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room in the back.
item.name: CANCEL! - Concord - video screening
